availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph L. Clements (Union Co, Ky, farmer)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, farmer. Maryland native. Married to Mary Mudd Clements in Union County on January 23, 1826. Father of Joseph Patrick Clements, S. L. Clements, M. E. Clements, F. M. Clements, Samuel B. Clements, George L. Clements, and Alice G. Clements. Married to Ann Clarissa Drury Clements in Union County on October 29, 1850. Farmer in Union County in 1850. Farmer in Union County in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in Union County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
